page.title: 05ST HUGHS SCHOOL
page.content: ST HUGHS SCHOOL WAS FOUNDED IN 1925 BY THE LATE MR. G.R.FORBES AND MRS.FORBES.IT EXPANDED RAPIDLY AND THE BUILDINGS WERE ENLARGED IN 1929 AND 1933.FURTHER PARTS HAVE BEEN ADDED OVER THE YEARS,THE LATEST BEING A LARGE CLASSROOM BLOCK AND A MULTI PURPOSE HALL. IN 1960 ,AFTER THE DEATH OF THE FOUNDER HEADMASTER,AN ADVISORY COUNCIL WAS ESTABLISHED UNDER THE CHAIRMANSHIP OF THE BISHOP OF LINCOLN.IN 1964 THE SCHOOL BECAME A CHARITABLE TRUST.IN 1980 A DECISION WAS TAKEN TO ADMIT GIRLS TO THE SCHOOL.THE SCHOOL IS SITUATED ON THE SOUTHERN EDGE OF WOODHALL SPA.THE SCHOOL HAS OVER THE YEARS BUILT UP VERY STRONG TIES WITH THE COUNTY.THERE IS ALSO A STRONG CONECTION WITH THE R.A.F.AS THERE ARE SO MANY LOCAL STATIONS.
